column4: how big should I make the swap partition? I got 256 MB SDRAM (on WinXp it's 256, max: 512)
how big should I make the swap partition? I got 256 MB SDRAM (on WinXp it's 256, max: 512)
At least enough to fit the whole ram if you want to hibernate. Twice the ram is the usual, less common with the ram size increases.
